selection_reasoning: We have a new champion from a constructive strategy (Iterative Deepening). I will focus on refining this new approach while keeping the Physics and Hex lineages alive as strong alternatives.

trial_selections.reasoning: New All-Time Best (2.6299). The 'Iterative Deepening' strategy (constructive packing) beat the global search methods. This is a new, highly promising lineage.
Previous Best (2.6292). Physics-based approach. Remains a top contender.
Best of the Hex lineage (2.625). Validates that perturbing the hex grid is robust.
